sources.title: Woman On Pier 13 (1949)
sources.description: Robert Ryan, Laraine Day, John Agar originally titled I Married a Communist

metadata.Plot: Brad Collins, former stevedore, is rising fast in a shipping company when local communist agitators use his former Party affiliation to extort his help in stirring up trouble. When Brad resists, communist femme fatale Christine works through his brother-in-law Don. But Brad's new wife Nan sees that her husband and brother are under pressure; when she investigates on her own, party boss Vanning takes ruthless action.
metadata.Writer: Charles Grayson, Robert Hardy Andrews, George W. George
metadata.Actors: Robert Ryan, Laraine Day, John Agar
